name: ARENA (itch) (mamuel)
description:
HOW TO PLAY

  • (ARROWS)  to move
  • (X ) to pick up objects / passed out enemies
  • land on enemy heads to make them pass out for a short period of time
  • throw enemies at other enemies to damage them
  • you can throw pots as well

INCLUDES

  • portals!
  • jump pads!
  • bugs!
  • royalty free music!
  • not my art!
  • a game!
